biotools.summary:
Identifying flow modules in ecological networks using Infomap.

Network community detection using the Map Equation framework.

A a package for running Infomap, inspired by ecological networks.

Infomap finds important patterns in complex networks by optimizing the map equation, which exploits the information-theoretic duality between the problem of compressing data and detecting patterns.

This site is an extension of the paper Identifying flow modules in ecological networks using Infomap.
